hh3cEvi.name: hh3cEvi

revisions.description: HH3C-EVI-MIB module for managing EVI-capable switches.

hh3cEvi.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cEvi.description: This MIB contains the objects for managing Ethernet Virtual Interconnect(EVI).

Hh3cEviMacType.name: Hh3cEviMacType
Hh3cEviMacType.description: MAC addresses include three types: dynamic, static, and flood (MACs configured for selective flooding).

hh3cEviDesignatedVlan.name: hh3cEviDesignatedVlan
hh3cEviDesignatedVlan.description: The designated VLAN is used for edge devices on a multihomed site to exchange EVI IS-IS hello packets for DED election and extended-VLAN assignment.

hh3cEviSiteID.name: hh3cEviSiteID
hh3cEviSiteID.description: Site ID. The edge devices in the same site must have the same site ID.

hh3cEviIfExtendVlanTable.name: hh3cEviIfExtendVlanTable
hh3cEviIfExtendVlanTable.description: A table that contains extended VLAN entries. A site extends extended VLANs to remote sites over an EVI tunnel.

hh3cEviIfExtendVlanEntry.name: hh3cEviIfExtendVlanEntry
hh3cEviIfExtendVlanEntry.description: Detailed information about each extended VLAN.

hh3cEviIfExtendVlanIndex.name: hh3cEviIfExtendVlanIndex
hh3cEviIfExtendVlanIndex.description: Each VLAN index specifies a VLAN ID in the range of 1 to 4094.

hh3cEviIfExtendVlanLAV.name: hh3cEviIfExtendVlanLAV
hh3cEviIfExtendVlanLAV.description: Local Active VLANs (LAVs), which are active VLANs on the EVI tunnel interface. The interface can extend only active VLANs to remote sites.

hh3cEviIfVlanMappingTable.name: hh3cEviIfVlanMappingTable
hh3cEviIfVlanMappingTable.description: VLAN mapping table on the interface.

hh3cEviIfVlanMappingEntry.name: hh3cEviIfVlanMappingEntry
hh3cEviIfVlanMappingEntry.description: Detailed information about each VLAN mapping.

hh3cEviIfVlanMappingSiteId.name: hh3cEviIfVlanMappingSiteId
hh3cEviIfVlanMappingSiteId.description: Site ID of the interface on which the VLAN mapping is configured. If '0' is specified, the operation applies to all sites.

hh3cEviIfVlanMappingSrc.name: hh3cEviIfVlanMappingSrc
hh3cEviIfVlanMappingSrc.description: Local VLAN ID in the mapping.

hh3cEviIfVlanMappingDst.name: hh3cEviIfVlanMappingDst
hh3cEviIfVlanMappingDst.description: Remote VLAN ID in the mapping.

hh3cEviIfAttributeTable.name: hh3cEviIfAttributeTable
hh3cEviIfAttributeTable.description: A table that contains EVI tunnel attribute entries.

hh3cEviIfAttributeEntry.name: hh3cEviIfAttributeEntry
hh3cEviIfAttributeEntry.description: Detailed information about the attributes of each EVI tunnel.

hh3cEviIfFloodingMode.name: hh3cEviIfFloodingMode
hh3cEviIfFloodingMode.description: State of the EVI flooding function. The function is enabled if the value is set to true.

hh3cEviIfARPSuppression.name: hh3cEviIfARPSuppression
hh3cEviIfARPSuppression.description: State of the ARP flooding suppression function. The function is enabled if the value is set to true.

hh3cEviIfFloodingMacTable.name: hh3cEviIfFloodingMacTable
hh3cEviIfFloodingMacTable.description: A table that contains MAC addresses configured for selective flooding.

hh3cEviIfFloodingMacEntry.name: hh3cEviIfFloodingMacEntry
hh3cEviIfFloodingMacEntry.description: Detailed information about each MAC address used for EVI selective flooding.

hh3cEviIfFloodingMacAddress.name: hh3cEviIfFloodingMacAddress
hh3cEviIfFloodingMacAddress.description: MAC address used for EVI selective flooding.

hh3cEviIfFloodMacVlanIndex.name: hh3cEviIfFloodMacVlanIndex
hh3cEviIfFloodMacVlanIndex.description: The VLAN that contains the MAC address.

hh3cEviIfFloodingMacRowStatus.name: hh3cEviIfFloodingMacRowStatus
hh3cEviIfFloodingMacRowStatus.description: State of the MAC address entry. You can use this object to create or delete entries. Deleting entries does not delete this object.

hh3cEviMacCountTable.name: hh3cEviMacCountTable
hh3cEviMacCountTable.description: EVI MAC statistics table. The table contains MAC entry counts sorted by MAC address types, including local MACs, local MAC conflicts, remote MACs, and remote MAC conflicts.

hh3cEviMacLocalConflicts.name: hh3cEviMacLocalConflicts
hh3cEviMacLocalConflicts.description: Number of local MACs that conflict with remote MACs.

hh3cEviMacRemoteMacs.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteMacs
hh3cEviMacRemoteMacs.description: Number of remote MACs received from remote edge devices.

hh3cEviMacRemoteConflicts.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteConflicts
hh3cEviMacRemoteConflicts.description: Number of remote MACs that conflict with local MACs.

hh3cEviMacLocalTable.name: hh3cEviMacLocalTable
hh3cEviMacLocalTable.description: MAC address table that only contains MAC addresses at the site.

hh3cEviMacLocalEntry.name: hh3cEviMacLocalEntry
hh3cEviMacLocalEntry.description: Detailed informaiton about each local MAC entry.

hh3cEviMacLocalVlan.name: hh3cEviMacLocalVlan
hh3cEviMacLocalVlan.description: VLANs that contain the local MACs.

hh3cEviMacLocalMacType.name: hh3cEviMacLocalMacType
hh3cEviMacLocalMacType.description: MAC address types, including: dynamic MACs, static MACs, and flood MACs (MACs configured for selective flooding).

hh3cEviMacLocalConflict.name: hh3cEviMacLocalConflict
hh3cEviMacLocalConflict.description: Whether the MAC conflicts with any remote MAC.

hh3cEviMacRemoteTable.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteTable
hh3cEviMacRemoteTable.description: A table contains MAC addresses received from remote edge devices.

hh3cEviMacRemoteEntry.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteEntry
hh3cEviMacRemoteEntry.description: Detailed information about each remote MAC.

hh3cEviMacRemoteVlan.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteVlan
hh3cEviMacRemoteVlan.description: VLANs that contain remote MAC addresses.

hh3cEviMacRemoteMacEffect.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteMacEffect
hh3cEviMacRemoteMacEffect.description: Whether the MAC can be used for forwarding traffic.

hh3cEviMacRemoteConflict.name: hh3cEviMacRemoteConflict
hh3cEviMacRemoteConflict.description: The remote MAC conflicts with a local MAC.

hh3cEviProcessPolicyTable.name: hh3cEviProcessPolicyTable
hh3cEviProcessPolicyTable.description: A table that contains routing policy information for each EVI IS-IS process.

hh3cEviProcessPolicyEntry.name: hh3cEviProcessPolicyEntry
hh3cEviProcessPolicyEntry.description: Detailed information about the routing policy for each EVI IS-IS process.

hh3cEviProcessPolicy.name: hh3cEviProcessPolicy
hh3cEviProcessPolicy.description: Routing policy for the EVI IS-IS process.

hh3cEviProcessGrTable.name: hh3cEviProcessGrTable
hh3cEviProcessGrTable.description: A table that contains graceful restart (GR) information.

hh3cEviProcessGrEntry.name: hh3cEviProcessGrEntry
hh3cEviProcessGrEntry.description: Detailed GR information for each EVI IS-IS process.

hh3cEviProcessGrEnable.name: hh3cEviProcessGrEnable
hh3cEviProcessGrEnable.description: Whether the GR function is enabled.

hh3cEviProcessGrInterval.name: hh3cEviProcessGrInterval
hh3cEviProcessGrInterval.description: EVI IS-IS GR interval in the range of 30 to 1800, in seconds.

hh3cEviProcessVSysTable.name: hh3cEviProcessVSysTable
hh3cEviProcessVSysTable.description: A table that contains virtual system entries. Virtual systems are associated with EVI IS-IS processes.

hh3cEviProcessVSysEntry.name: hh3cEviProcessVSysEntry
hh3cEviProcessVSysEntry.description: Detailed information about each vitual system.

hh3cEviVirtualSysId.name: hh3cEviVirtualSysId
hh3cEviVirtualSysId.description: Virtual system ID in hexadecimal notation. The virtual system ID must be unique in the EVI network.

hh3cEviISISNbrSummaryEntry.name: hh3cEviISISNbrSummaryEntry
hh3cEviISISNbrSummaryEntry.description: EVI neighbor statistics table entries. The entries contain the EVI neighbor summary for each EVI IS-IS process.

hh3cEviISISNbrMaxMultiHomes.name: hh3cEviISISNbrMaxMultiHomes
hh3cEviISISNbrMaxMultiHomes.description: The maximum number of edge devices that the site can contain.

hh3cEviISISNbrSiteNbrs.name: hh3cEviISISNbrSiteNbrs
hh3cEviISISNbrSiteNbrs.description: The count of neighbors that belong to the same site.

hh3cEviISISNbrLinkNbrs.name: hh3cEviISISNbrLinkNbrs
hh3cEviISISNbrLinkNbrs.description: The count of neighbors that are in remote sites.

hh3cEviISISNbrTable.name: hh3cEviISISNbrTable
hh3cEviISISNbrTable.description: A table that contains generic information about all neighbors.

hh3cEviISISNbrEntry.name: hh3cEviISISNbrEntry
hh3cEviISISNbrEntry.description: Detailed information about each neighbor of the edge device.

hh3cEviEnableTable.name: hh3cEviEnableTable
hh3cEviEnableTable.description: A table that contains all EVI-enabled neighboring ports of the edge device.

hh3cEviEnableEntry.name: hh3cEviEnableEntry
hh3cEviEnableEntry.description: Detailed information about each EVI-enabled port in the EVI network.

hh3cEviEnableStatus.name: hh3cEviEnableStatus
hh3cEviEnableStatus.description: End station service disable (trunk port) bit. When this bit is set (true), all native frames received on the port and all native frames that would have been sent on the port are discarded. The value of this object MUST be retained across reinitializations of the management system.

hh3cEviNbrBaseTable.name: hh3cEviNbrBaseTable
hh3cEviNbrBaseTable.description: A table that contains basic information about the EVI Neighbor Discovery Protocol (ENDP).

hh3cEviNbrBaseEntry.name: hh3cEviNbrBaseEntry
hh3cEviNbrBaseEntry.description: Detailed information about ENDP for each EVI tunnel.

hh3cEviNbrSelfServerStatus.name: hh3cEviNbrSelfServerStatus
hh3cEviNbrSelfServerStatus.description: If the value is set to true, the EVI neighbor discovery server (ENDS) is enabled. When you enable ENDS on an EVI tunnel interface, an EVI neighbor discovery client (ENDC) on the EVI tunnel interface is also enabled automatically, with the source address of the EVI tunnel as the server address.

hh3cEviNbrAuthPassword.name: hh3cEviNbrAuthPassword
hh3cEviNbrAuthPassword.description: ENDP authentication key. It is a zero-length string when being read.

hh3cEviNbrClientRegisterInterval.name: hh3cEviNbrClientRegisterInterval
hh3cEviNbrClientRegisterInterval.description: Interval at which the ENDCs on an EVI tunnel interface update their registration with their ENDSs.

hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerTable.name: hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerTable
hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerTable.description: A table that contains basic information about the remote ENDSs.

hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerEntry.name: hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerEntry
hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerEntry.description: Detailed information about each remote ENDS. When you set the address of a remote ENDS on an EVI tunnel interface, an ENDC is enabled automatically on the EVI tunnel interface.

hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerType.name: hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerType
hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerType.description: Address type of the remote ENDS, including ipv4 and ipv6.

hh3cEviNbrRemoteServer.name: hh3cEviNbrRemoteServer
hh3cEviNbrRemoteServer.description: Address of the remote ENDS. The address type is specified by the hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerType object. Address length (4 or 16 bytes) must be consistent with the address type.

hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerRowStatus.name: hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerRowStatus
hh3cEviNbrRemoteServerRowStatus.description: Entry status. This object is used to create or delete entries. Deleting entries does not delete this object.

hh3cEviNbrTable.name: hh3cEviNbrTable
hh3cEviNbrTable.description: A table that contains basic information about neighbors discovered with ENDP.

hh3cEviNbrEntry.name: hh3cEviNbrEntry
hh3cEviNbrEntry.description: Detailed information about each EVI neighbor.

hh3cEviNbrAddressType.name: hh3cEviNbrAddressType
hh3cEviNbrAddressType.description: Address type of the neighbor, including ipv4 and ipv6.

hh3cEviNbrAddress.name: hh3cEviNbrAddress
hh3cEviNbrAddress.description: Address of the neighbor. The address type is specified by the hh3cEviNbrAddressType object. Address length (4 or 16 bytes) must be consistent with the address type.

hh3cEviNewDed.name: hh3cEviNewDed
hh3cEviNewDed.description: Notifies that a new DED has been elected.

hh3cEviSiteEDTopoChange.name: hh3cEviSiteEDTopoChange
hh3cEviSiteEDTopoChange.description: Notifies that the EVI network topology has changed.

hh3cEviEDLinkDisconnect.name: hh3cEviEDLinkDisconnect
hh3cEviEDLinkDisconnect.description: Notifies that all the EVI links on a tunnel are down.
